cast.overview: In 1859, families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas. Meanwhile, a gruff cowboy soon finds himself on the run with a prostitute and a young boy after killing a fellow gunman.
cast.title: Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 1

cast.overview: An FBI agent teams with the town's veteran game tracker to investigate a murder that occurred on a Native American reservation.
cast.title: Wind River

cast.overview: Following the death of the Leigh family matriarch, Annie and her children uncover disturbing secrets about their heritage. Their daily lives are not only impacted, but they also become entangled in a chilling fate from which they cannot escape, driving them to the brink of madness.
cast.title: Hereditary

cast.overview: Several friends travel to Sweden to study as anthropologists a summer festival that is held every ninety years in the remote hometown of one of them. What begins as a dream vacation in a place where the sun never sets, gradually turns into a dark nightmare as the mysterious inhabitants invite them to participate in their disturbing festive activities.
cast.title: Midsommar

details.biography: Austin R. Grant is an American actor. Known for his work in Yellowstone (2021), Wind River (2017), Youth & Consequences (2018), and Hereditary (2018). He's worked alongside actors such as Jeremy Renner, Elizabeth Olsen, Kevin Costner, Toni Collette, Florence Pugh, and has worked with Academy Award Nominee directors Rob Reiner, twice with Taylor Sheridan, twice with Reinaldo Marcus Green, and twice with Ari Aster.
details.name: Austin R. Grant
